page.title: 16RECREATION
page.content: IN THE AREAS OF {MOONZIE AND LUTHRIE, FOR{RECREATIONAL}PURPOSES: SOME PEOPLE {CYCLE,WALK,GARDEN,READ,DO ARTS AND {CRAFTS,PLAY THE PIANO,KEEP PETS}OR {LOOK AFTER CHILDREN.}THEY DO THESE THINGS BECAUSE IT FITS IN WITH THEIR WORK OR BECAUSE IT KEEPS THEM FIT. OTHER PEOPLE DO{FLORAL ART}OR MAKE THINGS LIKE{KNITTED}OR{CROCHETED ARTICLES OR{WOODWORK.}SOME PEOPLE GO TO THE{CINEMA}AND SOME PEOPLE THINK OF {WORK}AS A PASTIME WHILE OTHERS WATCH {TV. THE{PARK}IN{LUTHRIE VILLAGE}WAS GIFTED BY A LUTHRIE FAMILY. THE VILLAGE AND THE{COUNTY COUNCIL}HELPED PAY FOR THE {SWINGS.}THE{REGIONAL COUNCIL}LOOKS AFTER THE{PARK.}BEFORE WE GOT THE{PARK THERE WERE{HOUSES}IN ITS PLACE.NEW {HOUSES}WERE BUILT AROUND THE EDGE OF THE{PARK.}
